paper_abstract: We provide a refinement of the sphere-packing bound for constant composition codes over asymmetric discrete memoryless channels that improves the subexponential factor in front of the exponent. The order of our subexponential factor is Omega(N-(0.5(1+epsilon+rho R)*())) for any epsilon > 0, where rho(R)* is the left derivative of the sphere-packing exponent at rate R and N is the blocklength.
paper_title: Refinement of the Sphere-Packing Bound: Asymmetric Channels
